title: Deals: Pixel 9, Galaxy S25 and Honor 400 series offered with freebies, cashback and discounts
description: This week on Amazon UK: price cuts, cashback, freebies and credit! Here are some interesting deals on Google Pixel 9, Samsung Galaxy S25 and Honor 400 series devices. The Google Pixel 9 is at a great price – with a straight £200 discount and £200 cashback, it works out to just £500. And you get a £50 coupon for the Pixel Buds Pro 2, if you need new TWS headphones. Google Pixel 9 £200 off£200 cashback£50 coupon for Pixel Buds Pro 2 Read our review 12/256GB - £500 at...
excerpt: Some of these phones come with free tablets, others get up to £400 cashback. This week on Amazon UK: price cuts, cashback, freebies and credit! Here are...
text: This week on Amazon UK: price cuts, cashback, freebies and credit! Here are some interesting deals on Google Pixel 9, Samsung Galaxy S25 and Honor 400 series devices. The Google Pixel 9 is at a great price – with a straight £200 discount and £200 cashback, it works out to just £500. And you get a £50 coupon for the Pixel Buds Pro 2, if you need new TWS headphones. The Google Pixel 9 Pro and 9 Pro XL have token discounts and the same offer – £200 cashback and a £50 coupon for the Pixel Buds Pro 2. Note that this offer is valid until July 7. You can find more details here. The Google Pixel 9 Pro Fold gets £400 cashback, but with no discount to go with that, it’s still very expensive. You may want to wait until the Pixel 10 generation to see if the much talked about switch to TSMC will improve the Tensor chipset woes. The original Samsung Galaxy S25 trio has no discounts at the moment, unless you count the £100 Samsung Credit you get with them. But you do get a freebie – a Galaxy Tab A9+ valued at £260 (that’s MSRP, of course). For detailed discussions on the pros and cons of the Pixel and Galaxy models, we will direct you to our head-to-head comparison articles: Pixel 9 vs. Galaxy S25, Pixel 9 vs. Pixel 9 Pro, Pixel 9 Pro XL vs. Galaxy S25 Ultra, Galaxy S25 vs. Galaxy S25+ and Pixel 9 Pro vs. Pixel 9 Pro XL. This offer is valid until June 26, you can find all the relevant details here. And no, the S25 Edge is not part of the deal. The Galaxy Z Flip6 and Z Fold6 are, but the next generation is coming in a few weeks time. Honor also focused on freebies. The Honor 400 is £100 off and you get a free Honor Pad X8a. This offer is valid until June 30. The Honor 400 Pro has no discount but stuffs your basket with goodies – an Honor Watch, Honor Choice Earbuds Clip and Portable Bluetooth Speaker Pro, all for free with the phone. This offer also lasts until the 30th. We may get a commission from qualifying sales.
html:
This week on Amazon UK: price cuts, cashback, freebies and credit! Here are some interesting deals on Google Pixel 9, Samsung Galaxy S25 and Honor 400 series devices.

The Google Pixel 9 is at a great price – with a straight £200 discount and £200 cashback, it works out to just £500. And you get a £50 coupon for the Pixel Buds Pro 2, if you need new TWS headphones.

The Google Pixel 9 Pro and 9 Pro XL have token discounts and the same offer – £200 cashback and a £50 coupon for the Pixel Buds Pro 2. Note that this offer is valid until July 7. You can find more details here.

The Google Pixel 9 Pro Fold gets £400 cashback, but with no discount to go with that, it’s still very expensive. You may want to wait until the Pixel 10 generation to see if the much talked about switch to TSMC will improve the Tensor chipset woes.

The original Samsung Galaxy S25 trio has no discounts at the moment, unless you count the £100 Samsung Credit you get with them. But you do get a freebie – a Galaxy Tab A9+ valued at £260 (that’s MSRP, of course).

For detailed discussions on the pros and cons of the Pixel and Galaxy models, we will direct you to our head-to-head comparison articles: Pixel 9 vs. Galaxy S25, Pixel 9 vs. Pixel 9 Pro, Pixel 9 Pro XL vs. Galaxy S25 Ultra, Galaxy S25 vs. Galaxy S25+ and Pixel 9 Pro vs. Pixel 9 Pro XL.

This offer is valid until June 26, you can find all the relevant details here. And no, the S25 Edge is not part of the deal. The Galaxy Z Flip6 and Z Fold6 are, but the next generation is coming in a few weeks time.

Honor also focused on freebies. The Honor 400 is £100 off and you get a free Honor Pad X8a. This offer is valid until June 30.

The Honor 400 Pro has no discount but stuffs your basket with goodies – an Honor Watch, Honor Choice Earbuds Clip and Portable Bluetooth Speaker Pro, all for free with the phone. This offer also lasts until the 30th.

We may get a commission from qualifying sales.
